Questions: Which of the following statements is  true?
Correct Answer: (c) Static member classes can contain non-static methods.
Wrong Answer 1: (a) Non-static member classes must have either default or public accessibility
Wrong Answer 2: (b) All nested classes can declare static member classes
Wrong Answer 3: (c) Static member classes can contain non-static methods.
Wrong Answer 4: (d) All nested classes can be declared static
